title: Interwiki
content:
[!--
EN Interwiki, based on the CN Interwiki by 7happy7 and Sekai-s.

Source: https://github.com/scpwiki/interwiki

Usage:

On the page that will contain the Interwiki:

 [[include :scp-wiki:nav:interwiki
| lang=en
| community=scp
]]

Change the lang and community for your branch as appropriate. Branches must be supported by Crom (https://crom.avn.sh).

On other pages (e.g. CSS themes), see https://scpwiki.com/component:interwiki-style to style the Interwiki.

See also: https://scpwiki.com/how-to-create-a-branch-of-the-scp-foundation
--]

[[div class="scpnet-interwiki-wrapper interwiki-stylable"]]
[[module ListPages range="." limit="1"]]
[[embed]]
<iframe src="//interwiki.scpwiki.com/interwikiFrame.html?lang={$lang}&community={$community}&pagename=%%fullname%%" allowtransparency="true" class="html-block-iframe scpnet-interwiki-frame"></iframe>
[[/embed]]
[[/module]]
[[/div]]
author: Croquembouche
